ru.bit.torrent

Class MessageSender

  • java.lang.Object
    • ru.bit.torrent.MessageSender
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class MessageSender
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    MessageSender is a thread instantiated in every MessageHandler who's duty is to send out all the messages in a given peer's queue. This allows for true simultaneous sending and receiving.
    Author:
    Dylan Murray
